usedFor: Create a new callgent for each item in the JSON array. This endpoint allows creating a new callgent with a name and optional summary/instruction, which matches the requirement to create a callgent based on item info.
description: Create a new callgent with a name and optional summary/instruction.

usedFor: Create a new server entry for the newly created callgent. This endpoint allows creating a new entry with the specified adaptorKey and type, which matches the requirement to create a server entry with {"adaptorKey":"restAPI", "type":"SERVER"}.
description: Create a new entry with the specified adaptorKey and type.

usedFor: Import the postman collection content into the created server entry. This endpoint allows importing batch content into a server entry, which matches the requirement to import the collection content.
description: Parse import text and create batch. Return { data: imported_functions_count } on success.

usedFor: Commit the newly created callgent into the hub. This endpoint allows committing a callgent to the Callgent Hub, which matches the requirement to commit the new callgent into the hub.
description: Commit a callgent to the Callgent Hub.
